articles.title: China To Test Entire City In "Five Days" After Six Coronavirus Cases - NDTV
articles.description: China aims to test more than nine million residents of the port city of Qingdao within five days following a minor outbreak of the coronavirus, health officials said Monday, the first mass testing in months.
articles.content:
China has bounced back since the virus emerged late last year.
